name: lock_file_updates
description: Tracks the number of times the lock file was updated within a specified time period.

dimensions.name: committed_date
dimensions.description: The date and time when the commit was made.

measures.name: lock_file_update_count
measures.description: Counts the number of updates made to the lock file.

sample_questions: How many times was the lock file updated last month?
What is the total number of lock file updates this year?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM commits.commits WHERE message_headline LIKE '%lock file%' AND committed_date >= $start_date AND committed_date <= $end_date
